title: Error code (0xc0000005)
body:
I clicked upgrade to the legacy client and then nothing happened after that so i clicked again on the join beta client and it said i was already signed up for it so i clicked launch and it said "The application was unable to start correctly (0xc0000005). Click OK to close the application" What do i do to fix this?

Edit: I do not have AVG this only occurred after i tried to join the new beta client. I have Norton security and i made sure league is an application it accepts

replies.body: Assuming this is happening when trying to launch the PBE, it sounds like your pc is blocking the patcher from opening.  You'll want to go through the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore that access.  I hope that helps.

Thanks for the help i was not trying to open the pbe i just upgraded to the new client and ever since then it was giving me that error message but i just reinstalled the game and then it fixed itself out.
